faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing and plans

items.question: Can I try Capsule Note for free?
items.answer: Yes! Our Starter plan is completely free and includes 3 letters per month with email delivery. It's a great way to experience the magic of time capsule letters.

items.question: What happens when my letter is delivered?
items.answer: On your scheduled delivery date, we'll send your letter via your chosen method (email or physical mail). Email letters arrive instantly, while physical letters are sent with tracking.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. Your existing scheduled letters will still be delivered, and you'll retain access until the end of your billing period.

items.question: How secure are my letters?
items.answer: We use bank-level AES-256 encryption for all letter content. Your letters are encrypted before storage and only decrypted for delivery. Not even our team can read your letters.

items.question: What's the difference between Email and Physical mail delivery?
items.answer: Email delivery sends your letter to your inbox instantly on the scheduled date. Physical mail prints your letter on premium paper and mails it to your address via USPS or international carriers.

items.question: Can I schedule a letter for 10 years from now?
items.answer: Yes! Pro and Enterprise plans allow scheduling up to 10 years ahead. We recommend using our 'Arrive-by' mode for important dates to ensure timely delivery.
